comments:
Build ID: I20070806-1800

While playing with the History View in order to make some progress on 188278, I bumped into a NPE. I tried to create a list of the exact steps I made, but I couldn't make it. IIRC I did some add/remove from version control on both files and folders. I got the NPE while fetching revision for one of .cvsignore files.

eclipse.buildId=I20070806-1800
java.version=1.5.0_10
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=pl_PL
Framework arguments:  -product org.eclipse.sdk.ide -pdelaunch
Command-line arguments:  -product org.eclipse.sdk.ide -data C:\workspace\runtime-EclipseApplication -dev file:C:/workspace/eclipse/team/dev.eclipse.org_HEAD/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.pde.core/Eclipse Application/dev.properties -pdelaunch -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86

Error
Wed Aug 08 11:17:36 CEST 2007
An internal error occurred during: "Fetching CVS revision history".

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.filehistory.CVSFileHistory.refresh(CVSFileHistory.java:106)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.CVSHistoryPage$RefreshCVSFileHistory.run(CVSHistoryPage.java:1319)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

The ".cvsignore" file, which caused the exception to be thrown, lied under a
folder which wasn't shared. At least this is how it looked in the Package
Explorer. The strangest thing is that at the same time the corresponding
"Entries" files contained an entry with that folder.

Created an attachment (id=75664)
Check for a null remote location of a resource

It looks like it was previously stated that this was verified in I20070917-1300. The problem is that it is very unclear where to retrieve the download for this. Is it in the latest build of Eclipse 3.3? if so what build number?

My info is:

Eclipse Platorm
Version 3.3.0
Build ID: M20070921-1145

The patch was released to HEAD so it won't be in the 3.3 Maintenance Stream. To download a distribution with the patch applied you will need to grab one the I- or N- builds made after 20070917-1300 (the I-build Szymon used should be enough). Please check Eclipse Project Downloads page[2].

[1] http://download.eclipse.org/eclipse/downloads/
